price: ߓߊ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ߞߏ ߟߋ߬ ߒߠߋ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߒ ߧߋ߫ ߛߌߟߊ߲߫ ߠߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊߣߊ߬ ߒ ߝߊ߰
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَيَّ ذَنۢبٞ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walahum ʿalayya dhanbun fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
